After creating a [[shadow clone]], [[Darui]] and his clone both use the [[Lightning Release: Black Panther]] technique to attack the target simultaneously.

== Trivia ==
* As opposed to its parent technique, this technique is generated from the user's hand instead of their entire body. This technique is also colourised as normal lightning when first generated.

[[es:Doble Pantera Negra]]
[[fr:Double Panthère Noire]]
[[pl:Daburu Kuropansa]]
